channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: A new hope - trying CloudFlare Pages, Hugo and Hugo-Coder all at once
item.description: A new hope Link to heading Well, I have decided to play around with hugo and static pages. This is my first test. The goal of the whole process is: To create my blog To learn more about CloudFlare products and start with a easy one This first blog has been created following those links: Getting Started with Hugo: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ Getting Started with Hugo-Coder: https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder/blob/main/docs/quick-start.md Hugo-Coder config example: https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder/blob/main/docs/configurations.md#complete-example Creating Hugo sites with CloudFlare pages: https://developers.
